subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Quikscript extensions to Shavian (or separate script)
msgSnippet: ... Because EVERY QS text would be stuffed with invisible control characters. Michael Everson * http://www.evertype.com/
messageBody:
On 20 Apr 2013, at 09:16, Jean-François Colson <jf@...> wrote:

> Why couldn’t there be
>
> 10450 𐑐 SHAVIAN LETTER PEEP
> ⁓ 10450 FE00 Shavian style
> ⁓ 10450 FE01 QuikScript style
> ⁓ 10450 FE02 QuikScript style, full form
> ⁓ 10450 FE03 QuikScript style, half form

Because EVERY QS text would be stuffed with invisible control characters.

Michael Everson * http://www.evertype.com/
